name: CheatMaster 3000
description:
The Cheat master 3000 is a device that's capable of hacking into every game and take the control out of the game and into your hands. 

Controls:

WASD to move

SPACE to activate levers ingame

Cheatmaster controls:

SPACE to cycle through placeable objects

E to place the selected element in the map

F to enter connection mode and F again to connect to elements

CAUTION: Side effects can include, Glitches, unexpected doors and levers behavior

Music:

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

SFX are from the unity store

Art was mostly done by me except for some ingame assets that come from

https://kenney.nl/
